short_summary: Supply and delivery of 40TKS-T2-00BEP3 SIGNO 40 Terminal parts
description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is soliciting a bid for the supply and delivery of 40TKS-T2-00BEP3 SIGNO 40 Terminal parts from certified suppliers. The bid call number is SA-E60HN-200ACS.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: 40TKS-T2-00BEP3 SIGNO 40 Terminal**
==============================================

### Contract Information

*   **Contract Title**: 40TKS-T2-00BEP3 SIGNO 40 Terminal
*   **Reference Number**: cb-8847-81737631
*   **Solicitation Number**: 202400670
*   **Amendment Number**: 1
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-09-07
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-09-25T13:00:00
*   **Amendment Date**: 2023-09-25
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-09-26
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: 2023-11-30
*   **Tender Status**: Expired

### Contract Details

*   **Goods or Services**: Electrical components (UNS/GSIN codes: *25173900*)
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

### Contact Information

*   **Contracting Entity**: Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) - GRC
*   **Contracting Entity Address**: 73 Leikin Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0R2
*   **Contact Person**: Megan McCoy, Megan.McCoy@rcmp-grc.gc.ca, (613) 791-8934

You have 300 words left to summarize the entire solicitation.

---

Below is a summary of the government tender announcement.

**Solicitation Summary**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) has issued a tender notice inviting qualified suppliers to bid on the supply and delivery of 40TKS-T2-00BEP3 SIGNO 40 Terminal parts. The requested goods will be procured under the E60HN-200ACS Access Control Systems Supply Arrangement.

Suppliers must be qualified in the National Capital Region (NCR) and have a valid access control systems supply arrangement (SA). The basis of selection is the lowest compliant bid.

Tenders must be submitted electronically to Megan McCoy at Megan.McCoy@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.
